answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Cheryl – I hope the following is helpful:
Norm, OK – Public Works Org Chart
http://www.ci.norman.ok.us/content/public-works-department-organization-chart 
Daly City, CA – Public Works Org Chart
http://www.dalycity.org/City_Hall/Departments/public_works/Public_Works_Divisions/Department_of_Public_Works_Organization_Chart.htm 
Salem, OR – Public Works, Parks & Transportation Org Chart
http://www.cityofsalem.net/Departments/PublicWorks/TransportationServices/Pages/OrganizationalChart.aspx
San Luis Opisbo, CA – Public Works Org Chart
http://www.slocity.org/publicworks/index_files/Org%20Chart%20in%20brief%20Jan%202011.pdf 
Merced, CA – Public Works Org Chart
http://www.cityofmerced.org/civicax/filebank/blobdload.aspx?BlobID=11066 
Marlborough, MA – Public Works Org Chart
http://www.marlborough-ma.gov/Gen/MarlboroughMA_PublicWrks/Organizational-Chart.pdf 
Pam

West Regional Director
Corporate Partner Liaison
Alliance for Innovation

answers.author: Toby Cotter
answers.text:
Cheryl - Our maintenance operations are within the public works department.


Cheryl - Our maintenance operations are within the public works department.


Save Changes
Cancel

answers.author: Leslie Beauregard
answers.text:
Our maintenance also falls within public works and we have City, schools and jointly owned buildings with our county neighbor that have cost sharing agreements as well.


Our maintenance also falls within public works and we have City, schools and jointly owned buildings with our county neighbor that have cost sharing agreements as well.

answers.author: Sam Anselm
answers.text:
Our maintenance functions also fall under PW as required by our city charter.


Our maintenance functions also fall under PW as required by our city charter.

author: Cheryl Hughes
text: Hello. I am trying to find some organizational structure examples to reference as we evaluate our current Maintenance structure. Currently, the Maintenance operations fall within our Public Works Department. If there are examples of other cities with the same basic organizational structure, can you please email me? Thank you!
title: Maintenance Organizational Structure
